name: Scorn
summary: Scorn is an upcoming first-person shooter horror game developed by Ebb Software for Microsoft Windows and Xbox Series X. The game is directly inspired by the works of H. R. Giger and Zdzisław Beksiński.
info:
• 中文名: 蔑视
  • 开发: Ebb Software
  • 发行: Ebb Software
  • 别名: Scorn - Part 1 of 2 : Dasein
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox Series X/S
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: TBA
  • 官方网站: https://scorn-game.com/
